It has been recognized as a core city since 2002.Jacobs, A.J. Retrieved 2012-12-5. ==History== Many of the temples, shrines and ruins in Nara form "Historic Monuments of Ancient Nara". It is one of UNESCO World Heritage Sites.Japan National Tourism Organization (JNTO), The Historic Monuments of Ancient Nara. Retrieved 2012-8-29. It includes * Tōdai-ji * Kōfuku-ji * Kasuga taisha * Gangō-ji * Yakushi-ji * Tōshōdai-ji * Heijō Palace The Kasugayama old-growth forest is also identified as a world heritage site. On 8 July 2022, former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe was fatally shot while giving a campaign speech in Nara. ==Geography== The city is in the northern part of Nara Prefecture.
